```{r load_libraries_specific, include=FALSE}
library(stars)
library(tidync)
library(units)
library(PCICt)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(rnaturalearthdata)

```

```{r 3D_variables}

world <- ne_countries(scale = "small", returnclass = "sf")

for (i_files in files) {
  
  # read in data
  variable_data <-
    read_ncdf(
      paste(path_cmorized,
            i_files,
            sep = ""),
      make_units = FALSE,
      make_time = TRUE,
      #ncsub = cbind(start = c(1, 1, 1), count = c(2, 2, 2)),
      var = "dissicos"
    )
  
  # convert to tibble
  variable_data_tibble <- variable_data %>%
    slice(index = 480, along = time) %>%
    as_tibble() %>%
    drop_na()
  
  # remove open link to nc file
  rm(variable_data)
  
  print(
  ggplot(data = world) +
    geom_sf() +
    geom_raster(data = variable_data_tibble,
                aes(lon, lat, fill = dissicos)) +
    scale_fill_viridis_c() +
    labs(title = i_files)
  )
  
  
  
}


```
